{"location_received": {"transitions": {"request_weather": {"next": "weather_request", "action": {"name": "process_event", "config": {"type": "question", "question": "What weather information would you like?", "example_answers": ["Current temperature", "Forecast for the week"], "publish": true, "allow_anonymous_users": true}}}}}}

{"feedback_received": {"transitions": {"finish": {"next": "end", "action": {"name": "process_event", "config": {"type": "prompt", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": ["Thank you for your feedback!"]}], "publish": true, "allow_anonymous_users": true}}}}}}
